CSSContain-intrinsic-height.summary: The contain-intrinsic-length CSS property sets the height of an element that a browser can use for layout when the element is subject to size containment.

remarks.para:
-content-visibility: the new CSS property that boosts your rendering performance (web.dev)
-contain-intrinsic-size
-contain-intrinsic-width
-contain-intrinsic-block-size
-contain-intrinsic-inline-size

CSSContain-intrinsic-height.value: The following values may be specified for an element.
